description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with the installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate a loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B & Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

We have received the existing and proposed site plan in 1:200 scale without road name. We require the location plan in 1:1250 scale with road names.Please submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are tree surgery work is acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the tree or reduce its amenity value, the Pine removal is also justified. Recommendation: Approve tree surgery work and Felling.
